Interface RiakEntityStoreConfiguration

    Configuration for RiakEntityStoreService.

    • Method Detail

      • hosts

        @UseDefaults
Property<List<String>> hosts()
        List of Riak Protocol Buffer hosts. Each entry can contain either an IP address / hostname or an IP address / hostname followed by a column and the host's port. Defaulted to 127.0.0.1 if empty.
        Returns:
        List of Riak nodes

      • username

        @Optional
Property<String> username()
        User name to use for authentication.
        Returns:
        Authentication user name

      • password

        @Optional
Property<String> password()
        Password to use for authentication.
        Returns:
        Authentication password

      • truststoreType

Property<String> truststoreType()

        Returns:
        Type of the keystore used for server certificate authentication

      • bucket

        @UseDefaults(value="polygene:entities")
Property<String> bucket()
        Riak Bucket where Entities state will be stored. Defaulted to "polygene:entities".
        Returns:
        Riak bucket name
